# Mock Incident Fixtures

This directory stores deterministic mock incident bundles generated by `rca.seed.mock_incident_generator`.

Each bundle folder contains:

- `manifest.json`
- `ground_truth.json`
- `ui_events.log`
- `api_logs.log`
- `db_events.log`
- `k8s_events.log`
- `mesh_events.jsonl`

Determinism contract:

- same `scenario + seed + time_anchor` => byte-identical stream artifacts
- only metadata timestamps may differ (`created_at`, `run_timestamp`)
